attributes.action: Treat all social security claimants in the same manner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some time ago I made a claim for Incapacity benefit, I have Lupus. Right from the start it was made clear that I was expected to find work as soon as possible. As I am far from work shy I did. But why doesn't the goverment treat all claimants in the same manner. My neighbour who is fit well and healthy hasn't worked in five years!!! Something is very wrong with this system. Why should the fit, well and healthy get away with it, when  the ill and disabled can not
